Text: Cool! Thanks Scene, your LINE is always the best!

Good copy for a cam.  The first minute or so isn't in English, but the rest is.  The sound is good and for the most part in sync.  It does drift a little here and there, but never for long.

All-in-all a very watchable copy, I give it:
V 7
A 7

Thanks very much!!!!

OK FOLKS! LISTEN UP!! THIS IS THE ONLY !!!! COPY YOU NEED!!!

Very watchable and the audio is a 10 as far as I'm concerned. All the other copies are the same and they all have the same tinny, echo filled bad audio. Audio on this is great. Thanks for the fix and the up.
